Head of Data Platforms, VenturesUnited Talent Agency, a leading talent agency based in Beverly Hills, CA, is seeking a Head of Data Platforms for our UTA Ventures group. The Head of Data Platforms is a hands-on role that will work with the broader UTA Ventures, Technology and Data Science teams and is responsible for defining products, analyzing the competitive landscape, and providing data insights along with supportive data to business teams across UTA Ventures to help shape our strategic investments across our venture, private equity and brand investments and develop a world class data pipeline for platform level data analytics to support our investments and brandsThe salary range for this role is $225,000 to $250,000 commensurate with experience and skills.What You Will DoTranslate Key Goals into Actionable Products: Understand key focus areas of UTA Ventures and work collaboratively with stakeholders to build products and reports that provide actionable insights. This role will be responsible for building a data foundation to perform data analytics and insight for new brand development opportunities through the UTA Ventures team and identify high value datasets for finding and evaluating investments across venture, private equity and incubations. Conduct Research & Analysis. Understand key industry sectors, trends and news within specific categories identified by the UTA Ventures team to identify high value datasets; ingest and modeling of data sources acquired through third party APIs, web crawlers and flat files to collect differentiated dataDevelop and Maintain Reporting Systems: Design and develop data models and produce ongoing and recurring reports for internal use by business teams including dashboards, ML and reportingData Ownership: Own the Ventures data platform through partnership with technology and data science. This could include research tools and licensed data sources and first-party data from our portfolio companies, social media, and other sources. Design processes and write code to ingest, extract, transform and load (ETL) data into a data repository. Contribute to the development of data and ML frameworks, tools, skills and cultureSet and Manage Benchmarks: Working closely with Ventures team to define key deliverables, benchmarks and evolve the platform over time. The ideal candidate will understand industry benchmarks and monitor data pipeline to ensure data quality.Analysis & Storytelling. Translates complex data into insights and compelling stories and cross-references data sets to offer comprehensive insights and analyses, providing practical, business-oriented, and actionable findings and recommendations.Prepare Material and Presentations. Create and communicate presentations and other materials related to key strategic initiatives and industry trends.What You NeedGrit. A self-starter who loves what they do. They never give up. They can think creatively about market opportunities and push hard to achieve their goals.Passion. A love for media, culture, and talent. They follow creators on social media, consume the latest brands and movies, and are naturally curious.Strong Verbal and Written Communication Skills. Can effectively communicate an opportunity or position to a wide variety of stakeholders including executives, agents, talent, managers, and lawyers.Detailed and organized. Effectively tracks and follows-up on all facets of the role including key projects.B.S./B.A. Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Statistics, Economics or related field, or equivalent practical experience. Master’s degree is preferred5 - 6+ years experience and proficiency in Python, SQL, batch ETL, data modelingFamiliarity with data analysis and machine learning (such as with R, Python) writing, managing and deploying codeFamiliarity with Apache AirflowFamiliarity with REST, web services, and cloud environments (AWS/Azure)Experience in areas like Operations Analytics, Supply Chain Analytics and Marketing AnalyticsExperience working with unstructured and ambiguous datasetsExperience in data mining to extract information from data sets and identify correlations and patternsExperience in SQL for complex querying, analysis, performance optimization, and persisting dataComfort with high volumes of unstructured and structured data, with the ability to leverage multiple datasets to draw both granular and big picture conclusionsComfortable working with multiple stakeholders across the organization to define and build actionable productsExperience in summarizing analysis into succinct written briefs/presentationsKnowledge of and ability to stay current on industry and technology trends along with the ability to quickly learn new tools and software.Experience with event tracking and analytics tools such as Segment, Google Analytics, etc.Knowledge of venture capital, private equity, media, culture, and start-upsExcellent academic track record from top-tier universityTeam player, proactive, results-oriented, problem-solver, strategic thinker, highly organized, flexible, strong analytical skills, excellent written and verbal communication skillsAbility to engage with clients, agents, management, legal and senior leadershipStrong passion for entrepreneurshipWhat You Will GetThe unique and exciting opportunity to work at one of the leading talent agencies and venture fundsAccess to the tools, leadership, and resources you will need to create and drive a center of excellenceThe opportunity to do the best work of your careerWork in an inclusive and diverse company cultureCompetitive benefits and programs to support your well-beingCollaborative colleagues who are focused on making an impactAbout UTAUTA unites ideas, opportunities and talent. The company represents some of the world's most iconic, barrier-breaking artists, creators and changemakers—from actors, athletes and musicians to writers, gamers and digital influencers. One of the most influential companies in global entertainment, UTA's business spans talent representation, content production, as well as strategic advisory and marketing work with some of the world's biggest brands. Affiliated companies include Digital Brand Architects, KLUTCH Sports Group, Curtis Brown Group, and MediaLink. UTA is headquartered in Los Angeles with offices in Atlanta, Chicago, Nashville, New York and London.For more information: https://www.unitedtalent.com/about/UTA and its Affiliated Companies are Equal Employment Opportunity employers and welcome all job seekers including individuals with disabilities and veterans with disabilities.
